description.spanish: Usa cualquier truco.

description.tchinese: 使用任一作弊。

description.english: Get any guest to VIP level 1.
description.spanish: Obtén el rango VIP de nivel 1 para todos los huéspedes.
description.brazilian: Faça qualquer hóspede chegar ao nível VIP 1.

description.tchinese: 使任一客人到達VIP等級1。

description.english: Get all guests to VIP level 5.

description.brazilian: Faça todos os hóspedes chegarem no nível VIP 5.
description.french: Avoir tous les clients au niveau VIP 5.

description.tchinese: 使所有客人到達VIP等級5。

description.english: Have a guest leave the hotel without paying.
description.spanish: Uno de tus huéspedes se ha ido sin pagar.
description.brazilian: Faça um hóspede sair do hotel sem pagar.
description.french: Un client part sans payer.
description.german: Ein Gast hat das Hotel verlassen, ohne zu bezahlen.
description.russian: Пускай гость покинет Поместье не заплатив.
description.schinese: 让一名住客离店结算时拒绝付钱.
description.tchinese: 使任一客人在沒有付款的情況下離開酒店。

description.english: Score 100% satisfaction on a guest interaction.
description.spanish: Obtén una puntuación del 100% sirviendo a un huésped.
description.brazilian: Consiga 100% de satisfação em uma interação de hóspede.
description.french: Score 100% satisfaction sur une interaction d'un client.
description.german: 100 % Zufriedenheit bei einer Interaktion mit einem Gast erreichen.
description.russian: Получи 100% по шкале удовлетворенности у гостя.
description.schinese: 在一次住客互动中达成满意100%.
description.tchinese: 在一次住客互動環節中取得100%的滿意度。

description.english: Renovate and fully upgrade all hotel facilities.
description.spanish: Renueva todas las habitaciones y servicios, e invierte en todas las mejoras disponibles para tu hotel.
description.brazilian: Renove e faça todas as melhorias de todas as instalações do hotel.
description.french: Rénover et moderniser entièrement toutes les installations de l'hôtel.
description.russian: Отремонтируйте и полностью модернизируйте все объекты отеля.
description.schinese: 解锁所有酒店设施并全部升满.
description.tchinese: 裝修及完全升級所有酒店設施。

description.russian: Имейте все три таблетки Физвилла в своем инвентаре.
description.schinese: 物品栏集齐菲尔威兹的三种药丸.
description.tchinese: 擁有所有菲茲威爾的藥丸。

description.spanish: Consigue todas las cartas de tarot.

description.spanish: Entra en un estado de armonía.
